instructions.title: How to use Base64 to GIF Converter

steps.title: Paste your Base64 string
steps.description: Copy and paste your Base64-encoded GIF data into the input area. The tool automatically detects data URL prefixes and removes them if present.

steps.title: Validate Base64 format
steps.description: The tool automatically validates your Base64 input and shows estimated file size. It checks for valid GIF headers (GIF87a or GIF89a) to ensure data integrity.

steps.title: Set custom filename (optional)
steps.description: Customize the output filename if needed. The tool auto-generates a timestamped filename by default for easy organization.

steps.title: Convert and preview
steps.description: Click 'Convert to GIF' to process the data. The tool displays GIF information including version, file size and provides an instant preview of the image before downloading.

steps.title: Download your GIF
steps.description: Click 'Download GIF' to save the converted image to your device. The preview ensures you're downloading the correct image.
